author: Tyler Aquilina
title: Ellen DeGeneres sparks backlash for comparing her quarantine to jail: 'Everyone in here is gay' - EW.com
description: Ellen DeGeneres sparks backlash for comparing her quarantine to jail: 'Everyone in here is gay' EW.com Ellen DeGeneres on Quarantine, Portia's Cooking & Jimmy's Wallpaper Jimmy Kimmel Live Quarantine-like jail joke brings fierce backlash for Ellen DeGeneres T…
content:
Ellen DeGeneres has once again drawn the internet's ire.
The comedian's daytime talk show returned to the air on Monday after suspending production due to the coronavirus outbreak, with DeGeneres hosting the show from home. In her first monologue from quaran… [+1944 chars]
